item.title: What are Java Args
item.description: Java Args are a way to direct java as a program on how to handle a Modpack on how to handle itself the best. We have a few recommended Java arguments for specific packs, however, they should work for any pack in general. We always recommend having at least 1.5GB to 2GB of RAM left over for your computer to perform normal tasks outside of Minecraft to ensure that it doesn’t cause crashes.
